description: Source files for the Plugin_AppGateway component, including core implementation, responder, resolver, and module classes.

classes.name: AppGateway
classes.description: Main class implementing the AppGateway plugin functionalities.

classes.name: AppGatewayResponder
classes.description: Handles responses for the AppGateway plugin.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: Performs resolution tasks within the plugin framework.

classes.name: Module
classes.description: Defines plugin module initialization and cleanup routines.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Sets up necessary components of the plugin during startup.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Cleans up resources used by the plugin during shutdown.
